content:
Of course, here are the links to the sources I used:

* Grand View Research, Inc. report on Indian Gold Jewelry Market: <https://www.grandviewresearch.com/industry-analysis/indian-gold-jewelry-market>
* Pew Research Center report on the Modern Immigration Wave: <https://www.pewresearch.org/hispanic/2015/09/28/modern-immigration-wave-brings-59-million-to-u-s-driving-population-growth-and-change-through-2065/>
* Nielsen report on the Rise of the Second Generation South Asian Consumer in the United States: <https://www.nielsen.com/us/en/insights/article/2018/the-rise-of-the-second-generation-south-asian-consumer-in-the-united-states/>
* Pew Research Center report on Millennials overtaking Baby Boomers: <https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2020/04/28/millennials-overtake-baby-boomers-as-americas-largest-generation/>

I hope you find these links helpful!
